name: Idli Karam podi
description: Idli Karam podi is the blend of spices and condiments, mainly Bengal gram, urad dal,cumin, salt, garlic, and red chili to finish it into a delightful spice side dish for breakfast and meals.

name: Nuvvula Karam podi
description: The Nuvvula Karam Powder has conventionally made of nuvvulu (sesame seeds), urad dal, Bengal gram, curry leaves, red chili powder, and other spices.

name: Kakarakaya Karam Podi
description: Our Bitter gourd karam is made with hand-cut and roasted kakarakaya/bitter gourd, along with lentils and aroma spices in 100% organic oil.

name: Kandi Podi
description: Kandi podi is a spice and condiment combination that includes Tur dal, Bengal gram, urad dal, cumin, salt, garlic, and red chili to create a delicious spicy side dish.

name: Avisaginjala Podi
description: Avise podi is made by finely roasting the flaxseeds and other spices to give you the yummy and piquant side dish uses culinary methods followed by our great grandmothers.

name: Karivepaku Karam Podi
description: Curry leaves are the main ingredient in Karivepaku Karam, and it provides surplus nutrition that can benefit in improving the health condition and reduce the risk of diabates.
